content.en: MRF Algorithm Advancements: Scientists have been exploring ways to improve the accuracy and speed of Magnetic Resonance Fingerprinting (MRF), a technique used to measure relaxation parameters in MRI scans. They have developed various algorithms to address different research questions, such as quantifying relaxation parameters using fast imaging, reducing acquisition time for reliable parametric maps, improving accuracy through maximum likelihood reconstruction, and accelerating MRF while maintaining robustness. These algorithms, including pattern recognition, iterative-denoising, dictionary matching, sliding-window reconstruction, and iterative reconstruction, have shown promising results in enhancing the performance of MRF.
content.da: MRF Algoritme Fremskridt: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre nøjagtigheden og hastigheden af Magnetic Resonance Fingerprinting (MRF), en teknik brugt til at måle relaxationsparametre i MRI-scanninger. De har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål, såsom at kvantificere relaxationsparametre ved hurtig billeddannelse, reducere optagelsestiden for pålidelige parametermaps, forbedre nøjagtigheden gennem maximum likelihood rekonstruktion, og accelerere MRF mens robustheden opretholdes. Disse algoritmer, herunder mønstergenkendelse, iterativ-afstøjning, ordbogsmatching, glidevindue-rekonstruktion og iterativ rekonstruktion, har vist lovende resultater i at forbedre MRF's ydeevne.
